verses.verse: Brothers<WG80>, my<WG1699> heart<WG2588>'s desire<WG2107> and<WG2532> prayer<WG1162> to<WG4314> God<WG2316> for<WG5228> Israel<WG2474> is<WG2076>, that<WG1519> they might be saved<WG4991>.

For<WG1063> they being ignorant of<WG50> God<WG2316>'s righteousness<WG1343>, and<WG2532> going about<WG2212> to establish<WG2476> their own<WG2398> righteousness<WG1343>, have<WG5293> not<WG3756> submitted themselves<WG5293> unto the righteousness<WG1343> of God<WG2316>.
For<WG1063> Christ<WG5547> is the end<WG5056> of the law<WG3551> for<WG1519> righteousness<WG1343> to every one<WG3956> that believes<WG4100>.

For<WG1063> Moses<WG3475> describes<WG1125> the righteousness<WG1343> which is<WG3588> of<WG1537> the law<WG3551>, That<WG3754> the man<WG444> which does<WG4160> those things<WG846> shall live<WG2198> by<WG1722> them<WG846>.

But<WG1161> the righteousness<WG1343> which is of<WG1537> faith<WG4102> speaks<WG3004> on this wise<WG3779>, Say<WG2036> not<WG3361> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> heart<WG2588>, Who<WG5101> shall ascend<WG305> into<WG1519> heaven<WG3772>? (That<WG5124> is<WG2076>, to bring<WG2609> Christ<WG5547> down from above<WG2609>:)
Or<WG2228>, Who<WG5101> shall descend<WG2597> into<WG1519> the deep<WG12>? (That<WG5124> is<WG2076>, to bring up<WG321> Christ<WG5547> again<WG321> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>.)

But<WG235> what<WG5101> says it<WG3004>? The word<WG4487> is<WG2076> near<WG1451> you<WG4675>, even in<WG1722> your<WG4675> mouth<WG4750>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> heart<WG2588>: that<WG5124> is<WG2076>, the word<WG4487> of faith<WG4102>, which<WG3739> we preach<WG2784>;

That<WG3754> if<WG1437> you shall confess<WG3670> with<WG1722> your<WG4675> mouth<WG4750> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424>, and<WG2532> shall believe<WG4100> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> heart<WG2588> that<WG3754> God<WG2316> has raised<WG1453> him<WG846> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, you shall be saved<WG4982>.
For<WG1063> with the heart<WG2588> man believes<WG4100> unto<WG1519> righteousness<WG1343>; and<WG1161> with the mouth<WG4750> confession is made<WG3670> unto<WG1519> salvation<WG4991>.
For<WG1063> the scripture<WG1124> says<WG3004>, Whoever<WG3956> believes<WG4100> on<WG1909> him<WG846> shall<WG2617> not<WG3756> be ashamed<WG2617>.

For<WG1063> there is<WG2076> no<WG3756> difference<WG1293> between<WG5037> the Jew<WG2453> and<WG2532> the Greek<WG1672>: for<WG1063> the<WG2962> same<WG846> Lord<WG2962> over all<WG3956> is rich<WG4147> unto<WG1519> all<WG3956> that call upon<WG1941> him<WG846>.
For<WG1063><WG99999> whoever<WG3956> shall call upon<WG1941> the name<WG3686> of the Lord<WG2962> shall be saved<WG4982>.

How<WG4459> then<WG3767> shall they call on him<WG1941> in<WG1519> whom<WG3739> they have<WG4100> not<WG3756> believed<WG4100>? and<WG1161> how<WG4459> shall they believe<WG4100> in him of whom<WG3739> they have<WG191> not<WG3756> heard<WG191>? and<WG1161> how<WG4459> shall they hear<WG191> without<WG5565> a preacher<WG2784>?

And<WG1161> how<WG4459> shall they preach<WG1437>, except<WG3361> they be sent<WG649>? as<WG2531> it is written<WG1125>, How<WG5613> beautiful<WG5611> are the feet<WG4228> of them that preach the gospel<WG2097> of peace<WG1515>, and bring glad news<WG2097> of good things<WG18>!

But<WG235> they have<WG5219> not<WG3756> all<WG3956> obeyed<WG5219> the gospel<WG2098>. For<WG1063> Isaiah<WG2268> says<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, who<WG5101> has believed<WG4100> our<WG2257> report<WG189>?
So then<WG686> faith<WG4102> comes by<WG1537> hearing<WG189>, and<WG1161> hearing<WG189> by<WG1223> the word<WG4487> of God<WG2316>.

But<WG235> I say<WG3361>, Have they<WG191> not<WG3756> heard<WG191>? Yes truly<WG3304>, their<WG846> sound<WG5353> went<WG1831> into<WG1519> all<WG3956> the earth<WG1093>, and<WG2532> their<WG846> words<WG4487> unto<WG1519> the ends<WG4009> of the world<WG3625>.

But<WG235> I say<WG3361>, Did<WG1097> not<WG3756> Israel<WG2474> know<WG1097>? First<WG4413> Moses<WG3475> says<WG3004>, I<WG1473> will provoke<WG3863> you<WG5209> to jealousy<WG3863> by<WG1909> them that are no<WG3756> people<WG1484>, and by<WG1909> a foolish<WG801> nation<WG1484> I will anger<WG3949> you<WG5209>.

But<WG1161> Isaiah<WG2268> is very bold<WG662>, and<WG2532> says<WG3004>, I was found<WG2147> of them<WG3588> that sought<WG2212> me<WG1691> not<WG3361>; I was made<WG1096> manifest<WG1717> unto them<WG3588> that asked<WG1905> not<WG3361> after<WG1905> me<WG1691>.
